adala warthawe dakunu ha madhyama aasiyanu parichchedaye shri lankawa sambandhayen karunu dakwa thibe.eltitiee thrasthawadaya yudamaya washayen shri lankawedi parajayata pathkalada antharjathika washayen mudal ekras kirime nirathawi sitina bawa penwadena amerikanu rajya departhamenthuwe nawathama warthawa me sandaha wiwidha punyayathana, samaja sanwidhana aadiya yoda ganna bawada kiya siti.thrastha kriyakarakam sandaha mudal ekras kirimata shri lankawedi idak nomathi bawada ee wenuwen pawathi idakada sampurnayenma ahura damimata shri lanka rajaya piyawara gena thibena bawada pawasana adala warthawa loka thrasthawadi sanwidhana sandaha mudal sansaranaya wime madhyasthanaya washayen me dakwa shri lankawa namkara thibu bawada penwa deyi.kese wuwada lokaye atham ratawala me wanawitath eltitiee sanwidhanaya athulu wiwidha thrastha sanwidhana sandaha mudal ekras kirima siduwana bawada amerikanu rajya departhamenthu warthawa mangin awadharanaya karayi..
